data.description:
Swivel is a VR ride through outer space that's jam-packed with music, movement, and excitement.

In this first-of-its-kind outer space experience, you swivel your way down a cosmic track straight to the dance floor. 

While you’re swiveling, get ready for a hands-on party - drumming, popping bubbles, opening doors, high-fiving aliens, and collecting music notes.

The beats? Crafted by the legendary Barry Leitch, these tunes groove with the story and your every move. There are 8 tracks, each with its own style, and the first ride, 'Fly,' is on the house – your sneak peek into the game's vibe:
- Fly - pop (free)
- Love me and leave me- 50s soul
- Sweet tooth - pop dance
- Sputnik - dubstep
- Spin - light metal
- Winter - classical
- Wally Beben - retro
- Ennio Morricone - western

Some rides are swivel-heavy, so be prepared for some serious spinning action. And guess what? There are also secret paths to up the fun factor!

– Important note –
Please take your time easing into the game. After a few days of play, our bodies adjust, and spinning becomes incredibly enjoyable – it's like tapping into our inner child. 

– Seated game with a minimum play space of 6.5 feet by 6.5 feet –
Swivel is a seated game that involves turning and making cool moves. Ensure you have at least 3.3ft (1m) of space in all directions.

We recommend using a ‘swivel’ chair to make those tricky turns a blast!

changelog.change_log:
- Added sound effects for various game elements (high fives, drum aliens.. etc)
- Fixed a few minor bugs in Fly, Spin and Love me and Leave me
